snippet: The author of this week's cover article answers questions about North Dakota's transformation, its unflamboyant beauty and whether the scarcity of women there is a shock.
abstract: The author of this week's cover article answers questions about North Dakota's transformation, its unflamboyant beauty and whether the scarcity of women there is a shock.

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: Chip Brown on Witnessing North Dakota’s Oil Boom
